product_name: Swix CH7 Violet Hydrocarbon Glide Wax - 180g
long_description: The CH7 Violet Hydrocarbon Glide wax is a great all-purpose wax. Use it as a prewax, base-bonding wax or a travel wax-it works great in most riding conditions. Wax formula contains some synthetic wax, making it durable in aggressive snow and ice. Wax offers base protection and great glide. Recommend iron temperature setting is 135degF. CH6 Blue wax is rated for 18degF to 28degF conditions.
short_description: The CH7 Violet Hydrocarbon Glide wax is a great all-purpose wax. Use it as a prewax, base-bonding wax or a travel wax-it works great in most riding conditions.
